jobInfo.postDescription:
系统测试专家
MAIN PURPOSE OF THE ROLE:
Do you want to be a specialist in 4G/5G area, especially get more familiar with eNB/gNB where the key wireless technologies are? Nokia Mobile Network is looking for SRAN system testing Engineers/Specialists to join our Hangzhou R&D center which is one of the biggest R&D site in Radio Acess Area. You will have invincible working experience in Single RAN projects with modern software development. Your responsibilities cover feature analyse, test planning, test automation development, test execution and reporting. Sometimes you need to use your expertise in your area in investigating and answering customer care questions.
Welcome to join us!
KEY RESPONSIBILITES:
• Ensure the End to End functionalities of SRAN (4G/5G) product meet the requirement of specification on network and node level with test planning and execution, main focus on Radio Resource Management area.
• Involved in FOT (feature owner team), discuss with system design and SW team, prepares test plan and test cases, also provide testing feedback to improve testability.
• Perform test in real End to End environment. Find/report faults, and follow up faults status in daily work.
• Test automation for the test cases and take full responsibility of the regression.
EDUCATION/QUALIFICATIONS:
M.Sc. or B.Sc. degree in Computer Science, Telecommunication Engineering or equivalent.

EXPERIENCE/SKILLS
• Good knowledge of wireless communication network, LTE/NR background is preferred
• Good understanding of SW development processes and you see the importance of testing in the process
• Previous experience in integration and verification work is preferred
• Test automation tools usage/ Python development experience is preferred
• Fluent written and spoken English
•  

PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:
• Self-motivated, target driven and innovative thinking
• Enjoy team work and open communication
